Title: Lover Girl
Actors: Tara Subkoff, Sandra Bernhard, Kristy Swanson
Plot: Jake is a 16-year-old girl whose mother left her. She finds her older sister Darlene in L.A., but Darlene turns her away. Darlene's neighbor Marci takes pity on Jake, allowing her to stay over. When Jake discovers that Marci is a ...
